info.title: Master Data for Group Reporting â€“ Read
info.description: This service includes master data for standard consolidation characteristics and master data for additional characteristics selected in the configuration of SAP S/4HANA Finance for group reporting. The master data, the attributes, and, if applicable, the hierarchy, are exposed for each characteristic.

x-sap-shortText: Select master data in SAP S/4HANA Cloud for group reporting using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: Finance - Cloud Consolidation Data Collection Integration(SAP_COM_0241)
Finance - Cloud Consolidation Master Data for Group Reporting Integration(SAP_COM_0336)
[Group Reporting - Data from SAP Group Reporting Data Collection(287)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/287 " Link To BP ")
[Group Reporting - Data from External Systems(2U6)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/2U6 " Link To BP ")
